name.en: Chair of Programming Languages and Systems

structural_unit_name.en: Chair of Programming Languages and Systems

description.en: The course will introduce students to essential aspects of software security, ranging from understanding vulnerabilities to defending against them with automated software verification methods.
description.et: Kursus tutvustab üliõpilastele tarkvara turvalisuse olulisi aspekte, alates nõrkuste mõistmisest kuni nende vastu kaitsmiseni automaatse tarkvara verifiteerimise meetoditega.

objectives.en: This course introduces students to quality-based cyber security, integrating automated software verification methods to ensure the absence of software vulnerability.
objectives.et: Kursus tutvustab kvaliteedipõhist küberkaitset, integreerides automaatse tarkvara verifitseerimise meetodeid, et tagada turvanõrkuste puudumine.

learning_outcomes.en: Having completed the course, the student will be able to
*	Identify key software vulnerabilities and the attacks that exploit them.
learning_outcomes.et: * Tuvastada olulisi tarkvara nõrkusi ning rünnakuid, mis neid ära kasutavad.

learning_outcomes.en: *	Use advanced testing and program analysis techniques for software security.
learning_outcomes.et: * Kasutada testimist ja programmianalüüsi tarkvara turvalisuse tagamiseks.

learning_outcomes.en: *	Apply automated software verification methods to ensure the absence of vulnerabilities.
learning_outcomes.et: * Rakendada automaatse tarkvara verifitseerimise meetodeid, et tagada turvanõrkuste puudumine.

independent_work.et: The instructions are given by lecturer

description.et: Homework in the form of quizzes and simple auto graded assignments; pass/fail.
Multiple choice moodle quiz will be graded based on correct factual answers.

grade_evaluation.et: Scores for the homework (30%) and the exam (70%) will be added.

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)
